messages.greeting_default:
Welcome! You can change this message by typing /setwelcome.

You can type /help to get the list of available commands.
messages.faq_default:
Q: How to change these questions?

A: You can edit them by typing /setfaq.
messages.help:
Commands:

/start - start working with the bot
/faq - Frequently Asked Questions
/newticket - contact our representatives
/calculator - assess your chances
/subscribe - subscribe to our newsletter
/unsubscribe - unsubscribe from our newsletter
/language - change your language
/quiz - show available quizzes
/cancel - cancel current operation
messages.help_contact:
Commands:

/ban - ban a user
/unban - unban a user
/id - get a user's ID
/close - close a ticket

You can reply to a message using the stock Telegram function.
messages.help_admin:
Commands:

/contactchannel - set a contact channel; get a contact channel (in DM)
/resetcontact - reset a contact channel
/subscribechannel - set a subscribe channel
/resetsub - reset a subscribe channel
/addsubject - add a subject
/listsubjects - list all subjects
/delsubject - delete a subject
/addcourse - add a course
/listcourses - list all courses
/delcourse - delete a course
/toggle - toggle modules on and off
/setwelcome - set welcome text
/setfaq - set FAQ text
/setbutton - set button text
/setwebsite - set website link
/addquiz - add a quiz
/delquiz - delete a quiz
messages.help_superadmin:
Commands:

/addadmin - grant admin permissions
/deladmin - revoke admin permissions
/transferownership - transfer ownership of the bot
messages.contact_sent: Your message has been sent! We will answer you as soon as possible.
messages.subchannel_success: Subscribe channel has been set! Any messages will be sent to subscribers.
messages.channel_success: This channel will be used for sending messages from people! You can reply to messages using the standard Telegram function.
messages.banned: You have been banned! Please, contact the administrator.
messages.unbanned: You have been unbanned! You can send messages again.
messages.subscribe_success: You have been subscribed to our newsletter! You will receive new offers and news.
messages.unsubscribe_success: You have been unsubscribed from our newsletter!
messages.subscribe_already: You are already subscribed to our newsletter!
messages.unsubscribe_already: You are already unsubscribed from our newsletter!
messages.delcourse_prompt: Please, select the course to delete...
messages.delsubject_prompt: Please, select the subject to delete...
messages.admin_already_admin: This user is already an admin!
messages.deladmin_prompt: Please, select the admin to delete...
messages.editcourse_prompt: Please, select the course to edit...
messages.editcourse_field_prompt: Please, select the field to edit...
messages.transferownership_prompt: Please, enter the new owner's ID...
messages.transferownership_confirm: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of the bot to this user?
messages.website_prompt:
Please, enter the website URL...
(e.g. https://example.com)
messages.no_contact_channel: No contact channel found! Please, set one using /contactchannel or contact the administrator.
messages.vktoken_prompt:
Please, follow the link to authorize.

When you are done, enter the token you received...
messages.vktoken_not_found: VK token not found! Please, enter one using /vktoken.
messages.vkgroup_prompt: Please, select the group you want to post from...
messages.ticket_open: You already have an open ticket! Please, wait for the administrator to respond.
messages.quiz_answers_prompt:
Please, enter the answers...
Format: Answer1, Answer2, Answer3, Answer4...
messages.quiz_external_intro: This is an external quiz. Please, follow the link to participate.
messages.calculating:
Calculating...
If you don't see anything, please, try again with different options.
messages.addsubject_again: Do you want to add another subject?
messages.addcourse_again: Do you want to add another course?
messages.input_subjects:
Please, enter the subject IDs...
Format: Subject1, Subject2, Subject3, Subject4...
